Tommy Sheridan is appealing against his conviction for perjury and yesterday his lawyer, Aamer Anwar , said: At the trial of Tommy Sheridan , Andy Coulson gave evidence under oath that he had no knowledge of phone hacking, despite Glen Mulcaire( a private investigator who did work for the News of the World and was sent to prison for phone hacking] having Mr Tommy Sheridan 's mobile phone number and personal details. His evidence should now be re-examined by the authorities. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
